isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - CAB DOOR ELECTRIC MIRROR SWITCH

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Electric Mirror Switch on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 65
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Connect wiring harness connector (Item 3) to the cab door electric mirror switch (Item 1), driver side shown.
Once the wiring harness connector (Item 3) is connected to the cab door electric mirror switch (Item 1), push wiring harness into opening in cab door trim panel (Item 2), driver side shown.

With the wiring harness properly positioned inside cab door trim panel (Item 2), position cab door electric mirror switch (Item 1) into the opening of cab door trim panel and push it down until the retaining tabs secure it in place, driver side shown.
